title: Mobile-Based Integrated Curriculum for Enhancing Mathematical Creativity in Large-Scale Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of college-level foundational mathematics concepts (discrete mathematics, calculus, statistics)
context.additional_context: Focuses on creative mathematical modeling for solving real job-related problems, utilizing collaborative learning environments with VR simulations and mobile apps.

learning_goals: Learners can design processes to solve real-world occupational problems using mathematical creativity in VR simulation environments.
Learners can materialize creative ideas using mobile technology-based collaboration tools (e.g., shared whiteboards, real-time data collection apps).
Learners can continuously improve and reflect on their creative mathematical modeling processes through formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
